PYTHON_EXPLANATION: This application is also available implemented in Python. The local variant downloads a local runtime environment (8MB compressed) into your browser and uses the values from the upper GUI components. The remote version will embedd https://repl.it into this website (2.3MB compressed) and does NOT use the upper GUI components but can be customized by editing its source code. Feel free to try them out:
PYTHON_REMOTE_NOTICE: To run the script, just click the green "Play"-button below this notice.
